screw.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a thin pointed piece of metal that you push and turn in order to fasten pieces of metal or wood together
screw.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws.
screw.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an offensive word meaning an act of having sex
screw.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a very offensive word for someone who is good at having sex
screw.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a prison officer â€“ used especially by prisoners
screw.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to attach one thing to another using a screw
screw.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The chairs were screwed to the floor.
The wooden frame should be screwed onto the wall.
screw.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to fasten or close something by turning it, or to be fastened in this way
screw.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The lens screws onto the front of the camera.
She carefully screwed the cap back onto the toothpaste.
screw.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to twist paper or cloth into a small round shape
screw.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: She screwed the letter up and threw it in the bin.
I screwed my handkerchief into a ball.
screw.translation[1].definitions[3].defi: an offensive word meaning to have sex with someone
screw.translation[1].definitions[4].defi: to cheat someone in order to get money from them
screw.translation[1].definitions[4].exam: They screwed us for $60 in the end.
